answers.answer: Hi and welcome to the GERD forumYes, it is possible for allergies and Post Nasal Drip to inflame GI issues.....and with the drainage you could also have a cough....You may want to see a Dr about allergies and or PND to see if that could in fact be your issue....When the GI track is in a flare most anything you eat will cause discomfort, even drinking water...so, see a Dr and get on meds to help calm it down so you can get back to eating more things again.
